code: import React,{useEffect,useRef,useState}from'react';import'./Skills.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Skills(){const skillData=["htmlpng","csspng","jspng","reactpng","javapng","xmlpng","springpng","jpapng","mongodbpng","mysqlpng","microservicespng","restapipng","kafkapng","gitpng","githubpng"];const[Skills,setSkills]=useState(skillData);const[isHovered,setIsHovered]=useState(false);const containerRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{let scrollInterval;const startScrolling=()=>{if(containerRef.current){scrollInterval=setInterval(()=>{containerRef.current.scrollLeft+=1;if(containerRef.current.scrollLeft>=containerRef.current.scrollWidth/2){containerRef.current.scrollLeft=20;}},20);}};if(!isHovered){startScrolling();}return()=>{clearInterval(scrollInterval);};},[isHovered]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Skills",id:"skills",onMouseEnter:()=>{setIsHovered(true);},onMouseLeave:()=>{setIsHovered(false);},ref:containerRef,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Skill-Container",children:Skills.concat(Skills).map(skill=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"SkillsImages/".concat(skill,".png"),alt:skill})}))})});}
